title: Teen in critical condition after shooting in west Columbus
content:
COLUMBUS (WMCH) — Columbus Police say a teenager is in critical condition after a shooting in west Columbus.
Police were called to the area of 1915 Floral Avenue around 7:40pm for the report of a shooting.
When officers arrived, they found a 17-year-old suffering from a gunshot wound. The victim and witnesses to the shooting told officers that an unknown suspect shot the victim with a handgun. The victim was taken to Mount Carmel West in critical condition.
Anyone with information is asked to contact the Columbus Police Assault Unit at 614-645-4141 or Central Ohio Crime Stoppers at 614-645-TIPS(8744).
